DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare cardiac MRI with positron emission tomography (PET) with fluorodeoxyglucose (FDG) to determine if cardiac MRI images are as good as, or better, than PET with FDG.
DOC.brief_title: Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) Viability: Comparison of Myocardial Viability by Positron Emission Tomography and MRI
DOC.criteria: PETFDG ordered to assess myocardial viability Contraindicated for MRI Pregnant Age <25 yrs
